title: Identify the Elements in $$SO_3$$
text: First, identify the elements present in the compound $$SO_3$$. What are the elements involved?

title: Determine Metal or Nonmetal
text: Sulfur (S) and Oxygen (O) are both nonmetals. Remember, nonmetals tend to form covalent bonds with each other.

title: Type of Bond Between Nonmetals
text: When two nonmetals bond, they typically share electrons. What type of bond does this indicate?

title: Review Covalent Bond Characteristics
text: Covalent bonds involve the sharing of electron pairs between atoms. This is common in compounds formed by nonmetals.

title: Classify the Bond in $$SO_3$$
text: Based on the elements involved and their bonding characteristics, classify the bond in $$SO_3$$.
